dslc_content_for_search:
  - 'Three Floyds Dark Lord Day Case Study Video This video is an older case study of ours, but it still demonstrates our range, focus and capabilities.While some of the pages and sites demonstrated within this video have changed, the underlying numbers have only grown: Dark Lord Day is now one of the largest privately funded beer events on the planet, Three Floyds Brewing is consistently regarded as one of the greatest craft breweries in the world, and their ROI on this initial campaign and our marketing support and copywriting is now well over 1000%. '
